your_store_has_been_successfully_deactiv: Success! store has been successfully Deactivated.
default_currency_warning_msg: You are about to set this currency as the default, and it will be reflected across the entire portal. Are you sure you want to proceed?
help_info_policies: Easily write and publish policies like Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. These will automatically appear in the footer of all your pages and the login form, ensuring all users see them.
successfully_renamed_title: You have successfully renamed policy title
error_updating_name: Error updating policy name. Please try again after a while.
contact_info: Mandatory if you are selling into the European Union.
delete_confirmation: This will permanently delete the policy. Are you sure you want to proceed?
order_policies: Drag to sort the order of the policies

store_logo_resolution: The image will look better if the resolution is 203x63.
banner_logo_resolution: The image will look better if the resolution is 1300x600.
color_validation: Please provide the valid color code.
contact_policy_info: Unchecking the 'Display contact information' option leads to deletion of this policy.
policy_bonus_note: Add essential contact information for users who need help.  (This is mandatory for businesses in the EU!)
policy_banner_image_note: Craft policies and terms to display in your store's policy section.
add_version_note: To create a new version, you can only increase the version number. Decreasing digits isn't allowed.
last_update_info: The date and time of publication will be shown under 'Last Updated'.
policy_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to publish the new policy?
policy_confirmation_note: This action will update the policy displayed in both the store footer and the login form.
poicy_warning: You can only publish up to "10 Policies". Please delete some policies to create more and publish.
policy_change_warning_info: You are about to cancel change made to '{{version}}' by doing this you will lose the unsaved data.
policy_change_warning_message: Are you sure you want to proceed?
profile_note: Access and update your user information, customize your preferences, and review policies in your comprehensive profile settings.
primary_content: You can't disable the primary account. To disable this one, choose another account and make it primary and you get disabled automatically.
primary_content_info: To switch primary accounts, click on another account and set it as primary instead.
primary_content_information: Making user the primary will remove primary access from the current user. This means the current primary user will have standard access.
standard_user_info: As a standard user, you cannot modify the primary account
non_primary_info: This can only be edited by primary users.
primary_status_modal_confirmation: The primary user will remove primary access from the current user. This means the current primary user will have standard access.
currency_info_note_one: Once the store is activated, the currency cannot be changed.
currency_info_note_two: Currency settings can only be adjusted during the store creation process
deactive_status_primary_message: Only active users are eligible to become primary users. The existing primary user has the authority to make this designation.
currency_warning_message: Are you sure you want to change the currency?
currency_message: Once it's done, you can't change it again.
language_document_data: Please upload a language support document utf-8 CSV format containing translated values, and we will use it to update the respective portals with the new language content.
language_code_helper_text: Only lower case letters are allowed
store_type_info_partner: A partner store is a subset of distributor store.
store_type_info_distributor: A distributor store can supervise partner store’s performance and also has the ability to display its products in any of them if it chooses.
set_as_distributor_store_desc: Are you sure you want to set this store as a distributor? This action cannot be undone. Once set, the distributor will have the ability to manage partner stores and display their products in them.
store_type_info: Your account does not yet have a Distributor store.

empty_email_name_message: Email cannot be empty. Please enter a valid email address.

enter_valid_store_name_message: Store Domain Name must be at least 3 characters long.
no_distributor_store_present_info: Your account does not have a Distributor store yet.
username_acceptance_criteria_note: Please note that your username cannot contain any special characters or symbols other than those listed above.
distributor_store_inactive_msg: Your Distributor store is not activated yet.
delete_profile_picture_confirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently remove your profile picture?
accepted_image_formats: Accepted image formats include .png, .jpg, .jpeg. Please ensure that the image size falls within the range of 1KB to 2MB.
